Rumors supplanted accurate information and media magnified the problem. Rapes, violence and estimates of the dead were wrong.
 http://www.latimes.com/news/nationworld/nation/la-na-rumors27sep27,0,5492806,full.story?coll=la-home-headlines
 
 This doesn't surprise me--this along with a lot of people anxious to find something to blame on Bush has caused him some political fallout. We need to be cautious about the media and know that things are sometimes not always as they seem on the news.

post_info.post_title: Katrina Takes a Toll on Truth, News Accuracy

Funny how you can spin anything to have a go at "teh liberal media!!!!1111!!!". Surely it's more likely that the poor reporting was a result of racism seeing as how it was blacks that were accused of the violence and rapes?
